meanings: memory, recollection, (formal) reminiscences, (formal) remembrance, reminisce, recall (to one's memory), recollect, look back (on)

vlive.korean: 그때의 추억을 다시 되돌아보면 뭔가 되게 호주가... When I look back on the memories, I miss... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 65
vlive.english: When I look back on the memories, I miss...

vlive.korean: [~추억의 노래 공감 TIME~] [~Throwback music time~] View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.21 네발라이더 #1 (Four Wheeled Rider #1)
또 행복한 추억이 되겠죠? it will be another happy memory, right? 듣기 View video TWICE : 헉
vlive.english: it will be another happy memory, right?

vlive.korean: 약간 어렸을 때 먹었던 추억의 맛이랄까요? It's like the flavor of my childhood? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 더비 뭐먹어
vlive.english: It's like the flavor of my childhood?

vlive.korean: "은지는 팬들을 어떤 사진 속 추억으로 'AWay' 하고 싶나요?" "Eun Ji, which picture do you wish to take 'AWay' your fans to"? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong Eun Ji X CouchTalk - 정은지 X 카우치토크
vlive.english: "Eun Ji, which picture do you wish to take 'AWay' your fans to"?

examples.korean: The place was overlaid with memories of his childhood. 발음듣기 그 곳에는 그의 어린 시절 추억들이 어려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The place was overlaid with memories of his childhood. 발음

examples.korean: The book is a collection of his reminiscences about the actress. 발음듣기 그 책은 그 여배우에 대한 그의 추억담들을 모아 놓은 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The book is a collection of his reminiscences about the actress. 발음

examples.korean: Memories crowded his mind. 발음듣기 그의 마음속에 추억들이 밀려왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
memories of those far-off days 발음듣기 옛날 그 시절의 추억 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: memories of those far-off days 발음

examples.korean: The music evoked memories of her youth. 발음듣기 그 음악을 들으니 그녀는 젊은 날의 추억이 떠올랐다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The music evoked memories of her youth. 발음
